name: vulcanicity

the activity of a volcano (= a mountain with a hole at the top through which hot liquid rock is or has been forced out): During this period, the eruptions reached their zenith - vulcanicity was less intense during the Triassic period. This is the only evidence to date for vulcanicity in this region.
